Note: For texts of the Gospel (including this Narratio) see 4638.
_description: Narratio: Mother of James and John, from the Northern Homily Cycle (Fifth Sunday after Easter), occurring separately

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
sant mathew tellys vsþat on womman prayed
                    Ihesus…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…Our lord to þat land vs lede& with þat fud fyll
                    & fede

BLHar2391.First Lines: For saynt mathew in hys gospell says vsþat a woman prayed Ihesus…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owr lord gode to þat Ioy vs ledeAnd with þat fode vs fyll & fede
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica V post pasche (left margin, f. 191)
